Mad Catz is one of the leading gaming hardware providers in the industry. For this project, it was necessary to redesign a new eco-friendly package design for the Mad Catz, Cyborg Rat 7 computer mouse. To accomplish this I designed a glue-less package out of recycled cardboard for the main box and the secondary box. The secondary box is necessary to hold all the additional hardware that is included to customize the mouse. In addition an 100% recyclable stand made out of aluminum that wrap around the secondary box and sat inside the first box was designed to hold and display the mouse.
